name: @dassie/app-build
description: Tool used to build the Dassie release version

scripts.test-in-docker:centos: docker run --privileged --network host --rm --env DASSIE_MIRROR_URL=https://localhost:8443 --env CURL_CA_BUNDLE=/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem -v "${PWD}/resources/shell-installer/:/opt/install" -v "$(mkcert -CAROOT)/rootCA.pem:/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem" -it jrei/systemd-centos /bin/sh /opt/install/install.sh
scripts.test-in-docker:debian: docker run --privileged --network host --rm --env DASSIE_MIRROR_URL=https://localhost:8443 --env CURL_CA_BUNDLE=/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem -v "${PWD}/resources/shell-installer/:/opt/install" -v "$(mkcert -CAROOT)/rootCA.pem:/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem" -it jrei/systemd-debian /bin/sh -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl xz-utils && sh /opt/install/install.sh"
scripts.test-in-docker:fedora: docker run --privileged --network host --rm --env DASSIE_MIRROR_URL=https://localhost:8443 --env CURL_CA_BUNDLE=/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem -v "${PWD}/resources/shell-installer/:/opt/install" -v "$(mkcert -CAROOT)/rootCA.pem:/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem" -it jrei/systemd-fedora /bin/sh /opt/install/install.sh
scripts.test-in-docker:ubuntu: docker run --privileged --network host --rm --env DASSIE_MIRROR_URL=https://localhost:8443 --env CURL_CA_BUNDLE=/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem -v "${PWD}/resources/shell-installer/:/opt/install" -v "$(mkcert -CAROOT)/rootCA.pem:/opt/mkcert/rootCA.pem" -it jrei/systemd-ubuntu /bin/sh -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl && sh /opt/install/install.sh"

author: Stefan Thomas <justmoon@members.fsf.org>
